alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:21PM CDT until August 12 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geneva, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Bonifay, Esto, Noma, Black, Lytle, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Geneva Municipal A/P, Holland Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Izagora, New Hope, Noma Junction, Somerset, Miller Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Eunola and Barker Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
